name: 4Taja - jump or be damned
description:
This is the story of 4Taja, a little blob that desires to stay quite in his garden.

Unfortunately, a group of aggressive crows, decided to nest in his park.
They lay eggs continuously. 
These eggs soon hatch and give rise to new crows.
4Taja can crush the eggs by jumping on them. 
Some break immediately, others slip away.
Fortunately there are some good little birds in the aid of 4Taja, bringing him some magic potions that help him run faster and jump higher.
Time is running up, let's help 4Taja!
